body:
I could give it a shot.  But it looks like it wouldn't play as nice with `go get`.  I just tried the following:

1.  Created symlink from:

    ```
    GOPATH/src/github.com/symlinktest/etcd -> ../coreos/etcd
    ```
1.  `$ go get -u github.com/symlinktest/etcd`

The `go get` command succeeded in updating github.com/coreos/etcd.  I would want this to fail or emit a warning.
